起きる.english: get up, get out of bed

寝る.english: lie down and sleep, go to sleep

近く.english: in the near future, before long

晩.english: evening, night from sunset to bedtime

六日.english: six days, sixth of the month

ちょっと.english: just a moment, just a little

戻る.english: return to a point of departure

五日.english: five days, fifth of the month

八日.english: eight days, eighth of the month

二日.english: two days, second of the month

三日.english: three days, third of the month

十日.english: ten days, tenth of the month

九日.english: nine days, ninth of the month

僕.english: I, me (usually used by young males)

四日.english: four days, fourth of the month

休む.english: take a rest, take a break

七日.english: seven days, seventh of the month
